name: ChessBot Babysitter
description:
You have been tasked with ChessBot how to play chess. All you need to place the black pieces so that the ChessBot can finish the game. But alas, this chess bot is very silly. If there is ANY ambiguity about which move they should do, they'll CRASH!

Rules:

Place black pieces in the lower third (or lower half) of the screen. White will go first. Once all the pieces are on the board, its up to ChessBot to make the moves...

ChessBot is a simple AI. It only has one rule: it takes THE best piece, If it isn't sure which piece to take, or take with... it crashes!

Controls:

  • Click and Drag black pieces onto your third/half of the board
  • "SPACE" - makes ChessBot play their next move (once all the pieces are on the board)
  • "BACKSPACE" - resets the level

KNOWN BUGS:

  • Pieces will get dropped if you drag them around too quickly
  • Black is currently
